u:update.u:name: Hierarchical Schema Composer
u:update.u:author: Colin Fitzpatrick
u:update.u:description:
Oracle™ SQL*Developer Data Modeler extension to allow users to create XSD's and JSON Schema from Logical Data Models.
The intent is to allow Enterprise Data Models to be converted to XSDs for Enterprise Web Services.
Oracle is a registered trademark of Oracle Corporation and/or its affiliates. Other names may be trademarks of their respective owners. This site is not affiliated with Oracle™ or any of their family of sites or Software.
[version @SCHEMA_COMPOSER_BUILDNUMBER@]
